import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import "./post.css" import MoreVertIcon from '@mui/icons-material/MoreVert'; import { Users } from "../../dummydata" function Post({post}) { const [like, setLike] = useState(post.like) const [isLiked, setIsLiked] = useState(false) const likeHandler = () => { setLike(isLiked) } return (
user.id === post.userId)[0] .profilePicture } alt='' /> {' '} {Users.filter((user) => user.id === post.userId)[0].username} {post.date}
{post.desc}
{post.like} people like this
{post.comment} comments
) } export default Post
